title: Adobe RoboHelp 2015 v12.0.3 + Crack [SadeemPC].zip
description:
Adobe RoboHelp 2015 12.0.3 Multilingual

Deliver personalized content across platforms and mobile devices. Adobe RoboHelp (2015 release) empowers you to deliver engaging help and policy content across mobile devices, formats, and platforms. Publish content as mobile apps, or in HTML5, EPUB 3, KF8, and MOBI. Help users find relevant content faster with dynamic content filters. Work more productively with a ribbon UI.	

Adobe RoboHelp 2015 Features:
With Robohelp, you can deliver engaging help and policy content across mobile devices, formats, and platforms. Publish content as mobile apps, or in HTML5, EPUB 3, KF8, and MOBI. Empower users to find relevant content faster with dynamic content filters. Work more productively with a ribbon UI.

System Requirements:
- Intel Pentium 4 or faster processor
- Microsoft Windows 7, or 8.1
- 1GB of RAM (2GB recommended)
- 3GB of available hard-disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation (cannot install on a volume that uses a case-sensitive file system or on removable flash storage devices)
- DVD-ROM drive
- 1024x768 screen resolution (1280x800 recommended) with 16-bit video card
